entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 40%

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain with periods of snow in the morning and with periods of drizzle late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
